name: F Mode
description:
Your reflexes have met their match! Take hold of "F" and whisk through rings and pass what ever is in your way. Mind the gap and master the speed bending controls of F Mode!

*No money? No problem! FREE Classic Version!

Features

  • Endless difficulty, Endless action.
  • Easy to play, impossible to master.
  • Single player bullet time mode.
  • Six skill ranks to master and collect.[Android Only (Basic,Bronze,Silver,Gold,...)
  • Two player versus mode.
  • Local Leaderboards

Song - "Son of a Rocket"

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
